claimsRegistry.title: Flyberry Gourmet Health Claims Registry
claimsRegistry.description: Consolidated health and nutritional claims from all products with usage guidelines
claimsRegistry.regulatoryNote: All claims based on nutritional facts per FSSAI guidelines and 2000 calorie daily diet RDA percentages

nutritional.description: Claims based on nutrient content and RDA percentages

functional.description: Claims about health benefits and body functions

natural.description: Claims about natural ingredients and processing

claims.detail: Supports digestive health / Promotes digestive wellness / That is good for your gut
claims.scientificBasis: Dietary fiber promotes digestive health and regular bowel movements (FSSAI nutrition guidelines)

claims.detail: Supports digestive health / That is good for your gut
claims.scientificBasis: Dietary fiber aids in digestive health (FSSAI nutrition guidelines)

claims.detail: Heart health support / Electrolyte balance and heart health / Muscle and nerve function / Helps maintain healthy blood pressure
claims.scientificBasis: Potassium helps maintain healthy blood pressure and supports heart function

claims.detail: Helps regulate blood pressure / Maintains electrolyte balance / Helps prevent muscle cramps
claims.scientificBasis: Potassium is essential for muscle and nerve function

claims.detail: Bone and muscle health / Muscle and nerve function / Supports muscle function / Energy production / Supports hundreds of body processes
claims.scientificBasis: Magnesium is essential for muscle and nerve function, bone health, and energy metabolism

claims.claim: Great source of iron / Good source of iron
claims.detail: Mental & physical performance / Red blood cell production / Oxygen transport in blood / Oxygen delivery to muscles / Helps prevent anemia / For healthy blood production
claims.scientificBasis: Iron is essential for oxygen transport in blood and prevention of anemia

claims.detail: For a stronger immune system
claims.scientificBasis: Vitamin C supports immune system function and acts as an antioxidant

claims.detail: Powerful antioxidant for skin and heart health
claims.scientificBasis: Vitamin E is a powerful antioxidant that protects cells from damage and supports heart health

claims.detail: World's richest natural source - supports thyroid function
claims.scientificBasis: Selenium is essential for thyroid hormone production and acts as a powerful antioxidant

usageGuidelines.disclaimer: Based on 2000 calorie diet. Just 2 nuts provide over 100% RDA. Limit to 2-4 nuts per day.

claims.specialNote: CAUTION: Extremely high selenium content. Recommend consumption limit of 2-4 nuts per day to avoid selenium toxicity.

claims.detail: Supports bone health and metabolism
claims.scientificBasis: Manganese supports bone formation, metabolism, and antioxidant function

claims.scientificBasis: Manganese supports bone formation and metabolism

claims.detail: Essential for bone health
claims.scientificBasis: Phosphorus is essential for bone and teeth formation, energy metabolism
